articles.description: Joe Thomas verdict on Everton's 3-0 win over Crystal Palace as Dominic Calvert-Lewin helps give Frank Lampard his perfect day
articles.content: With his first touch he stole the ball from a breaking Luka Milivojevic. With his second he flicked, delicately, the pass from Alex Iwobi around Marc Guehi. With his third he slotted his shot beyond … [+5528 chars]

articles.title: Brad Pitt dons a light blue zip-up jacket and baggy trouser co-ord at US Grand Prix in Austin - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actor, 58, kept things low-key in a white T-shirt which he teamed up with a light blue zip-up jacket and coordinating baggy trousers.
articles.content:
Brad Pitt cut a casual figure as he attended the Formula One US Grand Prix in Austin, Texas on Friday.
